author: Darthdany
title: The choice of design is great, as is the colour scheme.
review:
Breez is a fairly good Brain Attack! figure. Her weapons are cool, with a long blade thingy and a saw/shield. Her shield can also detach and attach to her back, which has enough space to rotate freely. Her visor can also lift from her mask and included is a code piece which attaches to her body armor plate.

Pros

  • Big and long blade.
  • Visor lifts.
  • Shield can attach to her back.

Cons

  • None really!

In conclusion I think this is a good Brain Attack starter set. 8/10.
